io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty

Class DnsQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty.DnsMessage<DnsQueryHeader>
      • io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty.DnsQuery

  • public class DnsQuery
extends DnsMessage<DnsQueryHeader>
    A DNS query packet which is sent to a server to receive a DNS response packet with information answering a DnsQuery's questions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DnsQuery(int id)
      Constructs a DNS query.
